attributes.action: Abolish such television programming such as Channel 4's "Hundred Greatest..." shows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These programmes dull the mind, the spirt and the will of the people.

By abolishing such mindless shows, the people could be healthier, happier, and more intelligent.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
